column2: latin_songs[order(-latin_songs$track_popularity),] %>% ggplot(aes(track_popularity)) + geom_bar() + labs(x='Track Popularity Score', y='Count', title='Number of Latin Tracks per Popularity Score', subtitle = 'A large proportion of songs have a 0 popularity score. This means that the playlists included in the \ndataset, some which were user created, contained songs which were not mainstream.')
